title: Kass buffs won't be enough...
body:
R - Should be 550-575 range
E - Should only require 5 charges
{{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:38}} 
The mofo set a record of 33% win rate on SR for as long as I know on LoLKing.net

replies.body:
Airaze you do realize his ult now has a 2 second base cooldown at rank 3 right?
with max cooldown reduction that becomes a 1.2 second cooldown.
I think he'll be aye okay in terms of power this patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Musterpulse,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=NdeY65A4,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-12T06:22:08.645+0000)
>
> Airaze you do realize his ult now has a 2 second base cooldown at rank 3 right?
> with max cooldown reduction that becomes a 1.2 second cooldown.
> I think he'll be aye okay in terms of power this patch.

I'm not airaze...

K yes I am but regardless, I miss the 700 range Kassadin who had a slightly longer cool down, but I preferred that since it's more viable in the mid lane...now he's a top laner I think...
